title: Proposal: Make $ALEX the first Rally Ambassador
body:
Discourse link:
https://forum.rally.io/t/proposal-alex-masmej-as-the-first-rally-ambassador/105

Summary/Abstract:
Allocate $250 of $RLY to alexmasmej.eth for every creator onboarded, disbursed monthly. Beyond just referring them to the platform, I will break down creator token to each creator, guide and propose use cases around their token, help communicate those on social media and will amplify on my channels. For 5 tokens referred, that means $1.25k worth of $RLY to alexmasmej.eth.

Motivation:

$ALEX is arguably the first creator token. I could onboard 5 people a month on average that are either in crypto or adjacent, like in tech or entertainment.

I have a unique edge because my audience and reputation mean that I get inbounds of people wanting help for their social tokens, so I have the leverage to be a Rally ambassador; plus, my growing Twitter audience is very receptive to social tokens announcements.

Target launch: ASAP if passed

A Yes vote for this proposal would accomplish the following:

Allocate $250 worth of $RLY to alexmasmej.eth disbursed monthly.
author: 0xD3e9D60e4E4De615124D5239219F32946d10151D
